name: Cannot update the integer param of "velocity_averaged_over" of project with extreme values -- @1.1

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "is not a valid velocity scheme"

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: is not a valid velocity scheme

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
